The classic 2048 Unblocked Game  offline version on your Google Chrome!
 2048 Unblocked Game Classic Offline Version (Less than 1MB)

Play 2048 Unblocked Game on your Google Chrome Browser. 

1. Install extension
2. Click the 2048 Unblocked Game icon on the Chrome extension toolbar 
and then we will open a 2048 Unblocked Game for you to play the game! You don’t need to do anything else! You also can play 2048 Unblocked Game from any Chrome Tab.
Have fun!
